page.title: 11RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There are lots of things for people living in this area to do and take part in.For pure enjoyment or also to benefit the local community. {Monday. Guides and Brownies in the School Hall {Women's Institute}at{Copster Green}2nd Monday of each month. {Tuesday. Cubs in the School Hall. {Wednesday. Mothers Union.Choir practice for the Junior choir.{Local History-}Hall. {Thursday. Scouts and Venture Scouts meet in the Memorial Hall.Church Needleworkers the 1st.and 3rd.at 2p.m::2nd. and 4th. at 7.15p.m.also in the Hall. {Friday. Cricket practice on the pitch at Salesbury Cricket Ground (6p.m. {Weekends. }Check local bulletins!!!
